attributes.background:
England’s schools are facing the largest real terms cuts in funding in more than a generation.
Unless the Government allocates additional money, schools and academies will lose huge amounts of money — rising to £3 billion a year in real terms by 2020.
Parents, governors and teachers need to fight.
